body:
Comment 1 by **esko.luontola**: 
The topic should say "runtime.Caller() handles the skip parameter incorrectly" but I 
don't have a edit button. Neither does Google Code have a preview button. :(

P.S. I was surprised to notice that runtime.Caller() has no tests. My philosophy is 
that of the XP and TDD community: if there is no test for a feature, then that feature 
does not exist. This bug would have been noticed if every function would have automated 
tests.
